评论概述: Gorgeous and well made, but didn’t fit me.
评论详情: I absolutely 100% loved this blazer. I so wanted to keep it because it was classy and elegant but allowed for so much movement and flexibility so it was somehow structured but stretchy and so so comfortable! Material was awesome, breathable but not too thin, color was vibrant, construction/sewing was beautiful. Unfortunately the color I wanted was only available in a small and I am pretty much an xs in everything but sometimes I can make a small work for me. This was not the type of clothing I could do that with. It’s supposed to be a bit more form fitting- not like excessively so but the cut and back seams are made to look more tailored and so, on me, it just looked like it wasn’t my size. And it wasn’t. However I think the xs would have been perfect- form fitting but not constricting. I believe the size chart is accurate and that it fits true to size. I wouldn’t recommend sizing up for a loose fit because it would probably look sloppy. I’m not taking any stars off because this is a 5 star product and if the color I wanted becomes available in my size I would 100% but again. For the price point this blazer is awesome and I would recommend it, if your size is available.

评论概述: Good quality and fit for price
评论详情: I bought a few colors and like them all- very vibrant but not cheap looking.  The fit is true to size.  The jacket is tapered shape (not boxy) with ruched sleeves.  Fabric is soft and comfortable with a bit of stretch to it. You can easily wear this both to the office and dress it down for more casual outings.  I packed it for a trip and it did need some ironing.  I have not washed yet, only threw it in dryer prior to wearing to tefresh and get wrinkles out.Good value overall for money.
